title: File Search
name: file-search
description: Enter file names to easily display the file.  Works for the following files:  Drawing files (Parts), Costs, Specs, Tools, Sketches, Test Specs, Process Specs, Material Specs, Worksheets, Electronic Part Files and RFPs
author: Paul Heil

preferences.name: TabFocus
preferences.title: When opening a tab switch to it immediately

preferences.name: PanelClose
preferences.title: Auto close search panel after search
